scripts.build: npm run build-translations && vite build && vite build --ssr
scripts.preview: [ -d build ]|| npm run build && vite preview
scripts.preview-ssr: [ -d build ]|| npm run build && cd build && node server.js
scripts.container: [ -d build ]|| npm run build && docker rm --force $npm_package_name && docker rmi --force $npm_package_name && docker run --name $npm_package_name --interactive --tty --publish 3000:3000 $(docker build --tag $npm_package_name --quiet .)
